Summary: TRianGular Fire-Ball... Hovering then mimicks a plane
divs: sighting detailsi woke up around 2:40am and went outside to have a smoke, looking east i observed a extremely bright amber color light behind the trees at a distant. i observed it for closed to 7 minutes when it started heading westbound as it moved it seemed to dip down then go back up a little higher, it kept moving when all of the sudden a plane flew by between the object and my stand point. the unkown craft then all the sudden change from a amber ball and seemed to mimick the aircraft passing by, the unknown craft then started heading my way. (note: i have seen plenty planes in my life to know, that the sudden change of direction for this craft wasn't typical of a jet liner) anyhow it headed my way and zoomed just about 1000ft just a few houses short of where i was and headed north\west. i was able to video table a good 5 minutes of the sighting but i dont have a source at the moment to upload my video. i was using a cannon elura, which is a older model video camera.
